entry.title: WIND WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 12:46 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: SE 45 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 100. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
